game.title: Slay the Mountain Troll
game.objective: Defeat the mighty troll that terrorizes the mountain pass.
game.description: A ferocious troll has made its home in the narrow mountain pass, preying on merchants and travelers. Slay the beast and bring peace to the region.
game.reward: A powerful magical weapon and a substantial bounty from the grateful townsfolk.

task.objective: Speak to Eldrin, the Village Elder, to receive the quest.
task.description: Seek out Eldrin in the village of Riverwood. He will provide you with valuable information and a map to the troll's lair.

task.objective: Locate the troll's lair in the Cursed Mountains.
task.description: Follow the map given by Eldrin to reach the hidden lair deep within the treacherous Cursed Mountains.

task.objective: Prepare for a fierce battle against the Mountain Troll.
task.description: Ensure you have the necessary weapons, armor, and potions before confronting the troll.

task.objective: Engage in battle with the fearsome Mountain Troll.
task.description: Battle the troll at its lair in the Cursed Mountains and provide proof of victory to Eldrin.

task.objective: Return to Eldrin with the troll's remains or trophy.
task.description: Bring Eldrin a trophy from the defeated troll or confirm your victory with a suitable proof.
